title: Good refreshments
text: During your stay in teh areal of thermal spa Bukfurdo you sometimes need a rest. And it is a good place for it! Good coffee, good sweets, some fast food.

title: Good lunch inside the area of Bukfurdo
text: Good choice if you are hungry during your stay in Bukfurdo and do not want to go anywehre outside. Prices are not bad when we count we are just next to the pool. And the quality of dishes is perfect.

title: It cured my backache there
text: I do not believe in miracles. But some 12 years ago I went there with long term backache and I cured it there. Since then I have been going there every year for several days and I am satisfied with everything.

title: Good dishes, reasonable prices
text: Once I had bad luck and our children got untasty pasta. On the other side, I was there 5 times later and dishes were very good.

title: Good prices, quite good dishes
text: There is a bit limited menu but prices are very reasonable. Unfortunately, sometimes there is possible to feel the smoke from the kitchen.

title: Perfect Hungarian cuisine
text: When you want to taste Hungarian cuisine for middle prices, it is the best place in Bük. You can try different national dishes, different fish, red wine...

title: Whenever I go to Bük, I have to eat there!
text: I often go to Bük to the spa. One day I discovered Feher Lo and since then I have visited it many times. The cuisine is absolutely perfect! The staff is able to speak several languages, sometimes there is also live music performance.

title: A small excursion to history in the centre of Athens
text: If you want to spend one hour seeing ancient Greeks sights without long queues, it is the right place for you. You can catch the spirit of history and maybe later you will go to climb Akropolis!

title: Taste of Greece in daily menu
text: When you are tired of seeing all collections in the museum, you can try to taste Greek cuisine in the restaurant. There are also “daily menus” with very good prices.

title: A history lesson in practice
text: The location is something unique what is not possible to be seen anywhere else in the world. I felt like a student in 3D history lesson.

title: A history lesson in practice
text: The location is something unique what is not possible to be seen anywhere else in the world. I felt like a student in 3D history lesson.

title: Fantastic museum with a spirit of ancient times
text: The museum should be taken as a compulsory part of visiting Athens. There are nice collections from ancient times, A fantastic huge building! And people who are tired can also visit a good restaurant with very reasonable prices.

title: The restaurant offers traditional Greek dishes
text: The restaurant offers traditional Greek dishes. Waitresses are able to speak both English and Russian and recommend you good combination of dishes to cover your knowledge about Greek cuisine.

title: Excellent place for space lovers
text: 3D movies about space, nice exhibitions, lesson about sky and stars, ... good for everybody who is interested in space.

title: Nice view of Brno
text: If you are lucky and it is a sunny day, you can see surroundings of Brno from the castle. By the way, there is no entrance fee for most places in the area!

title: An ideal place for active children
text: Take your children to this place to have a nice afternoon! There are many clever attractions for each kind of children.
place: VIDA! Science Centre Regular Entrance Ticket

title: Marvellous sandstone area
text: It is a secret treasure because you can see there a very nice sandstone rocks for reasonable price and there are less tourists than in the other parts of Ceczh-Saxon Switzerland.

title: A very nice view of Alanya
text: It is the best way how to get to the Alanya Castle (sorry, taxi drivers :-)) because you can go up the hill very cheaply, you can see all surroundings of Alanya and you can walk through the part of the castle where you do not have to pay any fee.

title: A peice of medieval history
text: You can walk around a medieval fortress for a long time and get nice pictures. You can also find marvellous views of the hill and feel like a real medieval pirate!

title: A small cave for small entrance fee
text: It is a small cave but I think it is good for people who do not need to spend insdie the cave more than 1 hour. And the price is very reasonble.

title: A perfect beach for everybody
text: It is a clean and well-equipped beach not far from the centre of Alanya. You can find free toilets or changing rooms there, as well as restaurants, parks... And, of course,a clean beach with safe parts for families with little children.

title: Watching ships, drinking tea
text: There are cheap restautrants and stalls with refreshment (fresh orange juice, tea, sea food ...) and a lot of ships and boats. A perfect place for feeling of atmosphere of a real port!

title: A very nice place with cats
text: You can spend a nice time during hot days here, on benches near water. And if you like cats, you can meet them in a special cat house.

title: A nice hotel in the centre of Alanya
text: If you want to spend your holiday in the centre of Alanya, it is a good place for you. Reasonable prices, a very pleasant staff, delicious dishes. And it is not far from both main beaches in the city. The only bad thing - noise form the restaurant nearby. They usually start to play loud music at 10:30PM and finish after midnight.

title: A place full of history
text: The memorial "Mohyla miru" ia a perfect place for history lovers. The only minus - it is not easy to get there by public transport. But there are many pluses. A very nice exhibitoon, reasonable prices, a very nice landscape, possibilities for walking.... Do not miss it!

title: Perfect meal for reasonable prices
text: I was nicely surprised when I could remember the days of my stay in Mexico – just in the Middle of Usti nad Labem! The food was very similar to the original one in Mexico, the atmosphere is maybe more Mexican than in Mexico ! Very quick and fast service, perfect meal, prices are in accordance with the offer.

title: An oasis in the centre of the city
text: The park LUZANKY is situated almost in the city centre. When you want to have a rest, drink or eat something small, you should go there and then continue in your tour around the city. There are several cafes and restaurants, many benches, public toilets (free!), tennis courts. Enjoy it!

title: High prices - bad service
text: You can be surprised that tables are made of undressed wood and they are not very clean. The waitresses are not in any casual or formal uniform - it is not easy to recognize that they are a part of the staff. There is not any price list for drinks available. Later we found it on the web page and the prices very different from the ones which we had to pay. But for this part of the city (5 km from the centre) and not very clean restaurant - the prices were the same as in any clean posh cafe in the city centre! . Anyway, we had to wait for quite long time for not very good coffee, we were asked to pay higher prices that are written on the official web page and the waitress did not give us any receipt. She only asked us to pay the sum of money she had told us. Actually, it was a kind of robbery! Never more!

title: A very romantic place for a walk
text: It is an ideal place for a romantic walks, as wekll as for a family trip. Do not hesitate to go around the lake!

title: A very nice place
text: It is a very nice location for a walk. Only the signs for tourists on the way should be more frequent and more visible!

title: A very nice experience
text: It seems to be very expensive - 58 EUR - but it covers combinations of a cog wheel train + 2 different cable cars. But the cog wheel is UNIQUE!!! Especially the tunnel through Zugspitze!

title: An excellent experience when the weather is nice
text: When you go there in a good weather, it is marvellous place. But in bad weather coniditons it could be a bit dangerous, especially for little children. And the capacity is also "at the edge"!

title: A very nice place for group sessions
text: If you want to spend a nice time witha group of friends, it is the right place for you. Delicious pizza, very good wine, pleasant staff.

title: Good prices at the top of Germany
text: It is not very cheap to ge t there because you have either use cable car or a special train (+ short cable car) but - at the top of Germany - you can eat and drink for reasonable prices! It is not any trap for tourists. Good job, Germans!

title: Good service, good dishes
text: This restaurant serves as a stop for people going on route 55 and it is far from the town center for locals or tourists. But it perfectly does its job. Good service, good dishes, reasonable assortment. Not Michelin restaurant but you can eat wuality dishes and get good refreshment.

title: Better than nothing in poor Straznice
text: You get the basic service there but do not expect eager waitresses. They would probably like to do any other jobs. On the other hand, most reastaurants in Straznice are even worse.

title: Good service but the prices ....
text: You can expect a very good service. On the other hand, the prices are a bit high for the rural location.

title: They need your money
text: The skanzen (open air museum) is nice. But the people working in the restaurant probably hate visitors. They do not like to serve them, they tell you that cook has just left and the only thing you can order is beer.

title: An interesting excursion for height-lowers
text: it is a paradise for people who like climbing old towers. You can see many interesting buildings from the birds’ perspective.

title: A very nice view of the centre of Brno
text: In the centre of Brno you can find a very nice watchtower. If the weather is nice, you should go there and watch around.

title: A very nice and quite place with good assortment of wine
text: If you go to Cerna Pole in Brno, you should taste different kinds of delicious wine close to the Mendel University. Only the opening hours are a bit short.

title: A nice place to see
text: If you are interested in history of Ireland, you should go tehre. Nice exhibitions can show you a mediaval life in old Ireland.

title: Go there with kids!
text: It is definitely marvellous place for family trips. You can see there hundreds species of animals from different parts of the wolrd, as well as attractions for children.

title: Good place for church lovers
text: If you are interseted in Roman Catholic Churches in Moravia, you have to go there. Sometimes you can hear magnificient organ music!

title: A very nice monument
text: You can see a nice monument, as well as historical building all around. A fine place for having a rest.

title: Somethinfg strange but beautiful
text: An astronomical clock withmotives from 1950s in socialist Czechoslovakia - it is a bizzare but really interesting show!

title: A very good place for a family trip
text: A very nice place - and if you are lucky, with a very nice view! - where you can stay with your family for a while.

title: Good steaks but ...
text: A very good place for special occasions but - the waiters sometimes forget what you wanted. And you can be without your meal or drink while the others are eating. Maybe they should chnage the system of "making notes about orders" :-)! On the other hand, the cooks are probably enthusiastic people because every single part of dishes was prepared perfectly.

title: Stinky place with ordinary meal for quite high prices
text: Unfortunately, there are not many restauranta with lunch menu near Mendel Square in Brno. It is the reason why many people do not have any other choice where to eat lunch. But the place is really stinky and after lunch your clothes will be stinky, either. Meals are ordinary but the prices are above average for this location.

title: A very interesting experience
text: If you are interested in brewing beer, it is the right place to increase your level of knowledge. I would only prefer possibilty to taste some small samples of different brands of beer, instead of sending visitors to the restaurant.

title: Nice place to see
text: You will definitely have to see it during your saty in Kutaisi! It is the statue connected to ancient Greek history.

title: Good place when you want to have a rest
text: There is not anything special but it is definitely a good place when you want to have a rest during your stay in Kutaisi.

title: Very helpful staff
text: If you want to know what to do in Kutaisi, you should go there. You can be susprised how friendly the staff is and they will help you to find good places in Kutaisi + surroundings for the best possible prices.

title: Small but cute
text: If you are bored by walking around noisy kutaisi, you can spend nice hours in the gardens. The entrance fee is very cheap.

title: Full day trip attraction
text: It is a good activity for "nature lovers" as well as for people who do not want to spend all day in shops.

title: A nice place to see
text: If you likte sculptures in Antique style, it is something for you. You can see it in the city centre, close to the beach.

title: A very nice attraction
text: A marvellous place with the statue of Medea + Argonauts! When going to Ajaria, you definitely have to see it!

title: A very nice attraction
text: A very nice trip to the seaside can be connected to watching very slow movements of this "moving sculpture". Very interesting!

title: Very tasty food
text: We had very good dishes there. Reasonable prices, good service, delicious soup + main dishes, good coffee.

title: Modern building
text: A nice place to see modern architecture. Unfortunately, nothing interesting for tourist nearby ... Anyway, worth to see it.

title: Good place for relaxing
text: When you want to walk around a hisotrical centre of Kutaisi, you definitely will see this bridge. There is a famous statue of a boy, you can listen to the sounds of river and you can see people going up the hill by the cable way. Only the dogs attacking tourists are horrible.

title: Marvellous building, marvellous view
text: You can see a unique building above the centre of Kutaisi, 15 minutes walk. Also the view of the cathedral is fantastic!

title: The price is the same as a comfort
text: You can get a cheap price for accomodation with a shared bathroom and a toilet. Only the bathroom could be separated in different room - one person blocks 2 toilets + 2 showers! And it is complicated to have breakfast because the dining room is for some 4 people. Any way, a very good low-coast hostel!

title: Nice spirit
text: Athough I am not beliver, I have to say I could feel the spirit of SOMETHING there. A very nice view of the monastery - you can see beautiful Caucasus, admire the monastery - and it is a very short and cheap way from Kutaisi!

title: 45 minutes of nice walk
text: A very fantastic cave but I would prefer a direct traffic connection from Kutaisi. You pay only 1.20 GEL to Tsklatubo and then much more for the rest of your journey ...

title: Nice nature
text: The only thing I did not like was the traffic connection from Kutaisi - you have to change, or take a taxi. But nature is fantastic, the cave as well.

title: Nice scenery
text: It looks like a fairy-tale! You can walk around lakes, have some refreshment - and breathe fresh air, watch the hills around you.

title: Not very luxurious but ...
text: If you want to spend some nights in Killarney for a low price, it is the place for you. Yes, the comfort is not very high, toilettes are sometimes horrible but the price is corresponding with the environment.

title: A bit chaotic atmosphere but great time
text: Becuase of many people inside the service is a bit chaotic. On the other hand, it is pleasant and you can get everything what you need (finally).

title: Nice evenings there
text: You can get nice music events here in combination with good service and good beer. Do you need more?

title: A bit higher prices but very nice place
text: Very good assortment of meals but only :common" lagers (Krusovice, Starobrno, Dacice - no local lagers, no ales, no stouts). Prices are a bit higher for the location but quality of service is very good. Maybe there could be offered some "special" brands of beer.

title: Good place for relaxing trips
text: You can spend there nice relaxing time during your stay in Brno. Nice nature, nice ships and boats, many opportunities for good meals ....

title: Not well drafted stouts and ales
text: "Overcold" stouts and ales with high foam (which means loss of paid liquid), a bit noisy environment, poor air-conditioning (and your clothes get stinky ...). Why should I come again?

title: A nIce trip point when you travel to Brno
text: Sometimes you need to have a rest during your stay in a city and you want to meet history and nature at the same time. It is the right place for you! You can walk, cycle or travel by steam boat there from Brno and spend relaxing time.

title: Dalesice beerhouse
text: Very good beer but not very good assortment of other drinks. Anyway, when you wast to taste different kinds of beer from the Dalesice brewery, it is the right place for you. Nothing for coffee lovers :-)!

title: Reasonable prices, good service
text: There is a good variety of beer (3 lagers, IPA), good meal, good pleasant service ... and prices are normal for this type of pub. And you can pay by card which is not usual in pubs in Brno!

title: You are trapped and you have to pay for it
text: You are inside the areal and you are a prisoner of restaurants and fast foods with prices which are highly above average, compared to prices which are normal in good restaurants "outside", several hundred meters from the entrance.

title: Good assortment of lagers but prices are a bit high
text: I have to say that there is possible to find good lagers and the service is very fast - but you have to stand (which gives the name to the pub, of course) for prices which are a bit high compared to more comfortable restaurants nearby.

title: Perfect amusement for people who love history and/or technologies
text: You can find there many different exhibitions based on history of technologies and everybody can find his/her "cup of tea"

title: (Almost) Irish atmosphere in Brno
text: Very good beers (lagers, stouts, ales) but service was a bit slow although there were not almost any guests ... Anyway, I have to recommend it.
